data.name: MxErrBadMethodParam
data.value: Error: internal parameter is invalid. This is a coding defect which has been reported. Please use alternative functionality until fixed.

data.name: MxErrBrowserFailed
data.value: Error: cannot start browser. Your web browser may be defective. Please reboot your computer and try again

data.name: MxErrException
data.value: Error: unexpected exception. This is a coding defect which has been reported. Please use alternative functionality until fixed.

data.name: MxErrInvalidChapterFile
data.value: Error: Chapter file cannot be opened. It has been corrupted. Run using --fix parameter and then try again

data.name: MxErrInvalidCondition
data.value: Error: invalid condition. This is a coding defect which has been reported. Please use alternative functionality until fixed.

data.name: MxErrInvalidParamArg
data.value: Error: parameter or argument is not correctly set. This is a coding defect which has been reported. Please try again with another parameter or install a later version of the application

data.name: MxErrInvalidSettingsFile
data.value: Error: your settings file is invalid. The file used for saving your program parameters and arguments is corrupt. Please delete KLineEdApp.json and try again

data.name: MxErrLineTooLong
data.value: Error: line is too long. You have reached the end of the line. Press the Enter key to continue

data.name: MxErrParamArgNameDuplicateFound
data.value: Error: duplicate argument name found. Command line parameters are incorrect. Please try again with correct parameters and arguments

data.name: MxErrParamArgNameNotFound
data.value: Error: argument name not found. Command line parameters are incorrect. Please try again with correct parameters and arguments

data.name: MxErrParamArgValueNotFound
data.value: Error: value of argument not found. Command line parameters are incorrect. Please try again with correct parameters and arguments

data.name: MxErrSystemFailure
data.value: Error: unexpected system problem. There may be something wrong with your system. Please reboot your computer and try again

data.name: MxErrTest
data.value: Error: test of error handling. Please take no action

data.name: MxErrUnsupportedParam
data.value: Error: parameter not supported. This is a coding defect which has been reported. Please try again with another parameter or install a later version of the application

data.name: MxMsgNotFound
data.value: Message not found. Coding defect. Please report this problem

data.name: MxWarnBackspaceAtStartOfLine
data.value: Warning: you cannot backspace at the start of a line.

data.name: MxWarnChapterEmpty
data.value: Warning: Chapter is empty. Please type a character and try again.

data.name: MxWarnEndOfChapter
data.value: Warning: you cannot move beyond the end of the chapter

data.name: MxWarnEndOfLine
data.value: Warning: you are at the end of the line. Press the left arrow key and try again.

data.name: MxWarnInvalidChar
data.value: Warning: invalid character. Please press another key.

data.name: MxWarnNoCharToDelete
data.value: Warning: no character to delete.

data.name: MxWarnStartOfChapter
data.value: Warning: you cannot move beyond the start of the chapter

data.name: MxWarnStartOfLine
data.value: Warning: you are at the start of the line. Press the right arrow key or enter a character.

data.name: MxWarnTooManyLines
data.value: Warning: Line limit reached. Please start a new chapter.

data.name: WelcomeNotice
data.value: {0} v{1}.{3}Copyright {2}.{3}Use subject to standard MIT License - see https://github.com/wpqs/AwsDotNetCmdUtils {3}
